attributes.action: Help all of those poor innocent dogs that are brutally murdered in china!
attributes.additional_details: how would you feel if this was your country and your pets being stolen to be put through agony . I don't have anything againt them eating them but the way they kill them is inhumane and stealing peoples pets is never okay .
attributes.background: in south west china aprox 15000 dogs are skinned ,boiled, set on fire or just left to starve all for "entertainment" they call it the yulin festival but how is waching innocent creatures put through agony a festival . china is a big country but china is a victim with pets being stolen just for this.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 
You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to take specific action, or you might like to sign this petition, which we think is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/128784
